summary: This document is a subpoena issued by the Palm Beach Police Department for subscriber information from T-Mobile related to a criminal investigation involving sex with minors. It commands T-Mobile to provide specific billing information and details regarding a telephone number, and outlines the consequences of failing to comply.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarey is mentioned as the recipient of the requested information from T-Mobile and is involved in the investigation.

persons.name: Manny
persons.context: Manny is identified as the Assistant State Attorney who issued the subpoena and is involved in the legal proceedings.

connections.description: Joe Recarey works under the authority of Manny, who is the Assistant State Attorney overseeing the case.

events.title: Subpoena Issued to T-Mobile
events.description: A subpoena was issued to T-Mobile for subscriber information related to a criminal investigation involving minors.

locations: 345 South County Road, Palm Beach, FL 33480
401 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, FL
keyFacts: The subpoena requests subscriber information and billing address for the telephone number 561-317-5844.
The document is part of an ongoing criminal investigation involving sex with minors.
Failure to comply with the subpoena may result in contempt of court.
The subpoena was issued on January 24, 2006, but was executed on January 21, 2006.
The document is subject to a protective order.
